comment_text: Why? Do. I do. I need Vanessa dating gossip so bad. Anyone? It is like, who is ever have been alive before seeing AND listening to one who IS Vanessa Hill!?!? I’m serious. But, I can’t be. It’s only that I’ve never been with a Vanessa let alone one Vanessa Hill (BrainCraft – not to be confused with another person with the same name.) You are intensely beautiful, in so many ways. So many ways. I can’t count how many. Depth. Sweet. Humble. Sincere. Attentive. Patient. Your oration is melting my heart. Your physical presence restrains the asymmetry to your desires. I couldn’t pretend to be anything more than your horse.
Is it even possible to be an expert of the human brain? What is the nervous system? And, I am naive.

6 years later… haven’t we figured out that I am an animal, Vanessa. Well? Fingers crossed I get at least 12 months in Ireland and we do cross paths IN person. I am so terribly sorry over this infatuation I’ve of you. Ireland, when/if you visit, of course.
So. A long time later. Why, commercials exist? Why? Why do commercials, exist?

What's the opposite of the planning fallacy?  I tend to overestimate the time needed to complete a task.  On the bright side it means I habitually under-promise and over-deliver which seems to make everyone quite happy so it's not really a problem (it helps that even my overestimates tend to be far less than was expected), but I'd still like to get better at accurate predictions.

such a nice episode ! I watch all the talk shows for two reasons : the themes are really diverse and I get to hear experts, or even better, passionate amateurs having an open conversation, giving me a context and the arguments that matter the most without giving too much subjective opinions...  and secondly, Jessi manages to bring knowledge and ethics along with her amazing smile. I hope you'll do as much talk shows than the number of animal species on this planet, I don't care if we have to go though all the cockroaches and the snakes, even though I truly hate snakes. That's for the content. I also like the way it's edited and filmed. Greetings from Belgium !
